Module jBomberman
Package model

Class Figure

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Figure
Direct Known Subclasses:
Prop, TesseraAbstract
public abstract class Figure extends Entity
Figure is an entity that exists within the game grid, it occupies a specific space entirely and does not move.
